channel.title: My Friend needs help with his server@@@@
channel.description:
he has a problem fixing the name to make his server say Owner jbird has logged on... from one of the npc...
if anyone knows how to do this u will become admin on his server
also to fix it from "nueb35" to Owner jbird
jbirdscape.no-ip.info
port 43594
